room_title: Escape room "The Factory - A Gas Works Company" by Epic Escape Game in Muncie
review: My daughter did the Factory....she didn't escape but they had a great time. We are coming back to try the Dr. Office!!

room_title: Escape room "The Factory - A Gas Works Company" by Epic Escape Game in Muncie
review: We did toys in the attic and it was a blast!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Factory - A Gas Works Company" by Epic Escape Game in Muncie
review: We had so much fun completing The Factory! Can't wait to try the other rooms - then we will be eagerly waiting to do new themes.

room_title: Escape room "The Factory - A Gas Works Company" by Epic Escape Game in Muncie
review: This was our first experience with an escape room. It was just my boyfriend and me in "The Factory" and unfortunately, we made it to the last lock and didn't make it out. What a fun and exciting experience! I would definitely recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "The Factory - A Gas Works Company" by Epic Escape Game in Muncie
review: This was our first visit to an escape room, and it was great. We played The Factory, and the clues were creative and challenging, and the staff was helpful in all the right ways.

room_title: Escape room "The Factory - A Gas Works Company" by Epic Escape Game in Muncie
review: So much fun! Staff was friendly and helpful. We had a group of nine and did The Factory. The room was a little small for that large group, but the staff warned us and it was our choice to stay together. Just saying that a group of four or five would be the perfect size. Highly recommend this as a team building event, couples night out, etc. You won't be disappointed.

room_title: Escape room "The Factory - A Gas Works Company" by Epic Escape Game in Muncie
review: We had a blast playing the Toy Box and The Factory rooms. You have an hour to complete each room and you can call for up to three clues. It was a fun challenge! Your group needs to communicate, try ideas, and work well together. Some of the puzzles & clues were pretty difficult to solve. I would like to come back later and attempt their other two escape rooms. One thing that is cool is that they have two Factory rooms so two different groups can start it at the same time & challenge each other to see who finishes first. Also, the staff here are very friendly.
